IS_ENUM: {property} must be one of the following values: {constraints.1}
MAX: {property} with value: "{value}" needs to be less than {constraints.0}
MIN: {property} with value: "{value}" needs to be at least {constraints.0}
IS_MONGO_ID: {property} must be a valid mongo id
ONLY_LOWER_CASE_OPTIONAL_UNDERSCORE: {property} must be a valid lower case string with optional underscore
IS_LOWERCASE: {property} must be a valid lower case string
IS_UPPERCASE: {property} must be a valid upper case string
IS_NOT_EMPTY_OBJECT: {property} must not be an empty object
IS_DATE_STRING: {property} must be a valid date string
